---
title: "Exploratory data analysis"
output: html_document
---

Loading the dataset:
```{r, echo=FALSE}
master_data <- read.csv("master_data.csv")
```

Loading packages:
```{r, echo=FALSE}
pacman::p_load(
  ggplot2,
  data.table,
  dplyr
  )
```

Plot of target variable:
```{r}
master_data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(TARGET)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "")
```
